normalised: fiber to home expansion gains momentum in India

unnormalised: New Delhi – The rapid expansion of Fiber-to-Home (FTTH) infrastructure across India continues apace, driven by increasing demand for high-speed internet connectivity. Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL) and private players like Reliance Jio and Airtel are significantly investing in laying new fiber optic cables, particularly in Tier-II and Tier-III cities.
